channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Light has been flashing for weeks now, 30th September
item.description:
The street light is continually flashing. It has been reported multiple times but no action taken, and has become a public nuisance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 107, St George's Drive, Pimlico, London

item.title: My estate is not being cleaned, 30th September
item.description:
It's been quite an few months now my husband and I have noticed that the cleaner comes and only mops the downstairs floor and leaves. This is unacceptable as all the floors as well as my floor are left uncleaned There are spider webs on the window sills.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Warwick Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van parked on pavement blocking access, 30th September
item.description:
There is a large white transit van blocking the pavement outside number 18 Kings Highway. The van is blocking access for wheel chair users, I saw a young boy on his way to school struggling today. The van doesn't move and is parked over the drop down.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Highway, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree effecting property and public highway, 30th September
item.description:
Please attend to this tree over hanging 50 % of my property, dropping crabapple over the pavement my cars and driveway Pease have the decency to do something about the mess on the pavement and road gully I am fed up with this continuing mess which gets trodden into my property it is getting out of control with this dam tree. please have the curtisy to have someone to personally respond to this request instead of the usual auto replies. I will again contact my local councillor if there is no action taken
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Way, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
